## Software Tools

- I will teach this course using the [Julia](https://julialang.org) programming language. Julia is a modern, free, open source language which is designed for scientific computing. No prior knowledge of Julia is required. My recommendation is to use [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) with the [official Julia extension](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/julia) for coding. However, you can use any programming language you would like to complete the assignments and the final project.
- Assignments will be distributed using [GitHub Classroom](https://github.com). You should create a GitHub account, but we will walk through how to use it.
